data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Sevilla, Andalucía, Spain to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sevilla, Andalucía, Spain
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Sevilla, Andalucía, Spain.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please give the church in the county of Sevilla prophets who can build up holiness and faithfulness to you.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the county of Sevilla prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Moroccan, Arabic-speaking people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the county of Sevilla. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the county of Sevilla.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sevilla, Andalucía, Spain has a population of 1,900,200.

We estimate Sevilla has 30,427 people who might know Jesus, 1,438,611 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 431,162 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the county of Sevilla, Andalucía, Spain. Please, stir the 30,427 believers here to pray for awakening.
